vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Λωίς (Rec. Λωΐς), -ίδος, ἡ
Lois: 2Ti.1:5.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at 2Ti.1.5;
mother of: Eunice (G2131)
§ - Lois, a Christian woman
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
羅以 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "令人愉快的"
提摩太的外祖母 (提後 1:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
罗以 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "令人愉快的"
提摩太的外祖母 (提后 1:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Lô-ít, « Tốt hơn », mẹ của Ơ-nít (Êu-nít) là mẹ của Ti-mô-thê
